title: Crime Alert 09.27.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 09.27.21
description:
Woman through 5-year-old boy into Ohio river, claims cops can't do anything in international waters. Man steals a horse and stables him in an apartment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
